data.text:
The hotels below are listed in order of their distance from Canada Place Cruise Ship Terminal.

Hotels > Canada > Canada Cruise Ship Ports > Hotels near Canada Place Cruise Terminal

Hotels near Canada Place Cruise Terminal  Vancouver, BC

Use this simple form to find hotels, motels, and other lodging near the Canada Place cruise ship passenger terminal in Vancouver, British Columbia.

The Canada Place Cruise Terminal serves as one of two ports of embarkation and debarkation for the Port of Vancouver. The other is the Ballantyne.

Canada Place Terminal is located in the heart of downtown Vancouver near hotels, restaurants, shopping, and attractions. Each year between May and November, more than a million passengers sail into or out its two cruise ship terminals.

Cruise lines originating from the Port of Vancouver include Carnival, Celebrity, Holland-America, Norwegian, Princess, Radisson Seven Seas, Royal Caribbean, Silversea, and Vancouver-Alaska Cruise Lines.

Hotels near the Cruise Ship Terminal at Canada Plac

Located right in the heart of downtown Vancouver, the Cruise Ship Terminal at Canada Place is the home port of numerous cruise lines to different destinations, including the breathtaking Alaska route. The terminal is a national iconic landmark that welcomes more than 900,000 passengers annually. It's close to the city's numerous attractions, including:

Stanley Park

FlyOver Canada

Lookout Harbour Centre Tower

Sea Wall

Vancouver Aquarium

Gastown

Explore the City

While waiting to board your cruise ship, you might want to spend a few days exploring the city. The luxurious full-service Fairmont Waterfront Hotel Vancouver provides spectacular water views, and is just steps away from the terminal. The CAA four-diamond full-service waterfront Pan Pacific Hotel Vancouver is just an elevator ride to the terminal. In addition, there are 18 more hotels near the terminal, some of which boast waterfront rooms. Can't wait to book a hotel room near the terminal? Check out HotelGuides.com's 7 Reasons to Book With Us to read about our lowest rate guarantee.

HotelGuides made it easy to choose a hotel based on how far we wanted to get that day. Also liked being able to see the interstate interchange on the map to determine how far off the highway each hotel was.

- Marie Hunt

Why Book Here?

Pay at hotel

See more reasons

Hotel Booking Tips

Beware of non-refundable reservations that could cost you a lot of money if you change or cancel them. +Non-refundable reservations are a gamble that will usually save you less than $10. If you make a $90 non-refundable reservation instead of a $100 refundable booking, you are betting $90 to win $10. Would you do that in Las Vegas? -

Don't assume you can cancel a non-refundable reservation without penalty if you notify the hotel weeks or even months in advance. +Often you cannot  because some hotels' profit strategy is to get paid more than once for the same room for the same night. -

Always read cancellation policies carefully before you make a reservation. + When is the latest date and time you can cancel without penalty? -

More >

When you make a reservation, you will receive a confirmation email. Take a copy with you to the hotel.

The earlier in the afternoon you check into a hotel, the more likely you will get a room or suite that matches your preferences.
